subject: Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Cablevision said Wednesday that it would only carry the NFL Network’s coverage of the Texas Bowl on a basic cable channel, ignoring the network’s offer to carry a free weeklong preview that would include the game.
snippet: Cablevision said Wednesday that it would only carry the NFL Network’s coverage of the Texas Bowl on a basic cable channel, ignoring the network’s offer to carry a free weeklong preview that would include the game.
